title: Stephen Egerton from Descendents/All
itunes:title: Stephen Egerton from Descendents/All
description:
Presented exclusively by Audible, visit audiblepodcasts.com/100words for your free audiobook! I am proud to bring this amazing conversation I had with Stephen Egerton from one of my favorite bands of all time the Descendents. We discuss his introduction to independent music, his early touring life and the experience of being a touchstone for a lot of independent music fans. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
